name: Annual Village Fair (Mela)
description: Join us for the annual celebration with food, games, cultural performances, and stalls selling local goods.

name: Free Health Check-up Camp
description: General health check-up including blood pressure and sugar monitoring. Organized by Vadodara Health Trust.

name: Community Meeting - Water Supply
description: Discussion on upcoming improvements to the village water supply system. All residents are encouraged to attend.

name: Holi Celebrations
description: Community gathering to celebrate the festival of colors. Please use organic colors.

name: Weekly Market Day
description: Local vendors sell fresh produce, snacks, household items, and handicrafts.
